pages.title: Crystallizer Recipes
pages.text: [Singularity Mold + Milkllary Bucket = Milkllarity], [Singularity Mold + Mid-Term Ingot = Mid-Term], [Ingot Mold + Mid-Term = Mid-Term Ingot], [Ingot Mold + Milkllary Bucket = Milkllary Ingot], [Ingot Mold + Milkllarity = Milkllary Ingot], [Bucket + Aljame = Liquid Aljame Bucket]
